text: MHz Legacy is the first studio album by American hip hop group MHz Legacy. It was released on Man Bites Dog Records on October 30, 2012. It features guest appearances from Danny Brown, Ill Bill, Slaine, and Slug. Production is handled by the likes of Harry Fraud, Marco Polo, and J. Rawls. Music videos were created for "Gone", "Somewhere", "Obituaries", "Outta Room", and "Satisfaction". ==Critical reception== At Metacritic, which assigns a weighted average score out of 100 to reviews from mainstream critics, MHz Legacy received an average score of 81% based on 4 reviews, indicating "universal acclaim". ==Track listing== ==References== ==External links== * Category:2012 albums Category:Hip hop albums by American artists Category:Albums produced by RJD2 Category:Albums produced by Harry Fraud Category:Albums produced by Illmind Category:Albums produced by Marco Polo Category:Albums produced by J. Rawls
title: MHz Legacy (album)
